column1: The learned President’s Counsel also cited the definition given to the term
‘Commissioner General’ in Section 83, the interpretation Section, of the
VAT Act which reads as follows;

column2: General of Inland Revenue appointed under the Inland Revenue
Act, No. 38 of 2000, and includes a Commissioner, and a Deputy
General  either  generally  or  for  a  specific  purpose  to  act  on
